name: TKNReptainium
title: [TKN] Reptainium
author: kleopi
description: Adds a new material called Reptainium which can be obtained by sacrificing lots of materials. Reptainium can then be processed into other materials. In this way you can turn leftover iron into copper or even into circuits. NEW: Added the second Tier. Machines are still invisible...intended ofc *cough* For discussions feel free to join our Discord: http://discord.gg/G9QwJWA
